attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

Copyright 2023 GAMLS. All rights reserved.

data.description: 4% Sellers Credit or 2/1 Buydown! Just in time for the Holiday Season. Over 3000 SQ FT, 4 Bedroom 2.5 bath home located in the Richmond Park neighborhood in beautiful Locust Grove. Enjoy a game at the USSSA Baseball Holder park with your family or furry animal!   The home's floor-plan includes: living room, den, breakfast nook, dining room, open kitchen, fireplace, large owners suite with 4 closets; including a walk-in closet, bathroom equipped with a stand-in separate shower, garden tub for relaxation, reading/office area all in the owners suite, 3 additional bedrooms, 2 additional bathrooms, 1 full and 1 half-bath downstairs for guest, washer & dryer hook-ups on top floor for your care, plus 2-Car Garage. The home is located in a cul-de-sac minutes from shopping centers!  FHA, VA, Conventional or Cash Buyers welcome!  Buyer Appraisal Covered & No Cost 2 year Refinance window. Call Chole Joines at Integrity Mortgage for details: 336-964-4983.
